Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Fix and enhance Linq feature" (#1091) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Fix and enhance Linq feature

This PR makes the following changes:

- Make interface internal
- Fix Save() method by not saving if XDocument.Root is null
- Add IsRootXElementLoaded(this OpenXmlPart part) extension method
- Rename interfaces and classes
- Add unit tests

The new naming is based on the OpenXmlPartRootElement class. We are essentially dealing with XElement representations of OpenXmlPartRootElement instances that can be accessed directly via GetXElement() or indirectly via the containing XDocument that can be accessed via GetXDocument().
